After 10 days and taking the entire script I went back to see the doctor to have the staples removed from the bite and doc prescribed me another week. In this week I start experiencing new symptoms. It started hurting on the upper part of my injured leg really bad but not at the bite location and my legs were swelling. My head started to hurt and didn't stop for three days straight and mouth was extremely dry all the time and couldn't taste. Still have vagina itching, swelling, soreness and frequency to urinate.

Will never take medicine again!! Day after still nausea, next day better and no more itchy hands or feet, but then next day nausea again for like 5 hours, and itchy feet and hands again later in evening again. Fine after now, but really weird symptoms. Never again !
